english.segment2: There's no silver or gold. And no treasure untold. That could draw me away from Your heart. Neither love of myself. Or of anyone else will do
english.segment4: Jesus nothing compares. To this grace that rescues me. Saviour now and forever. Your face is all I seek
english.segment6: Now all I am. I lay at Your feet. I'm humbled by the wonder of Your majesty. One thing I know. I find all I need. In Your unending love. In Your unending love
english.segment8: Letting go of my pride. I lay down my desires. Just to worship in Spirit and truth. More than all of my dreams. More than fame I will seek You Lord
english.segment10: Jesus nothing compares. To this grace that rescued me. Saviour now and forever. Your face is all I seek
english.segment12: Now all I am. I lay at Your feet. I'm humbled by the wonder of Your majesty. One thing I know. I find all I need. In Your unending love. In Your unending love
english.segment13: Now all I am. I lay at Your feet. I'm humbled by the wonder of Your majesty. One thing I know. I find all I need. In Your unending love. In Your unending love
